on run
	display dialog "Adobe Lightroom helper to choose an editor to open images" & return & return & ¬
		"Dirk Essl" & return & ¬
		"3/2008"
end run
on open these_items
	repeat with i from 1 to the count of these_items
		set this_item to (item i of these_items)
		set the item_info to info for this_item
	end repeat
	tell application "Finder"
		set PTapp to (path to me)
		set PTme to ((the container of (PTapp)) as alias) as string
	end tell
	tell application "Finder"
		set Pfol to list folder (PTme & "Apps") as alias without invisibles
	end tell
	
	set Pfol to Pfol
	repeat
		set choice to (choose from list Pfol)
			if choice is false then
			exit repeat
		else
			set choice to choice as string
			tell application choice
				open these_items
			end tell
			exit repeat
		end if
	end repeat
end open
